channel.title: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3
channel.description:
Well apparently Valve has stated that they have "no idea" what to do with Half-Life 3. What you guys think?
[url]https://gamingbolt.com/no-idea-what-were-going-to-do-for-half-life-3-valves-new-years-resolution[/url] [url]https://www.itwire.com/your-it-news/entertainment/62701-valve-admits-it-has-no-idea-on-half-life-3[/url]

item.title: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
striker:

Yes it does. Although they said they wouldn’t hold back any release purposefully because of vr. A decision I think could be overthrown very quickly.

VR, yes, but they may very well wait for a new engine. It doesn’t make much sense to work on a game for your old engine when you’re also working on a new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3

item.title: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
A non-HL will probably come out on Source 2 first. Counter strike source came before HL2.

You know what? I’d welcome a l4d3 with open arms if they wanted to use that as a vehicle to show off their tech. I can see the obligatory “there Y is just there to show off X effect/ feature” working a lot better for a L4D than a Half Life.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3

item.title: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
Xeoxer:

I’m a bit concerned about that. They’ll be using the hard work of their fans to generate even more money for THEMselves. After all, they have rights to claim anything that was made using their engine.

Sorry, forgot the irony tags.

JohnWorfin:

It seems highly probable that they will release their next cut of their flagship franchise as the debut of their new engine

Yes it does. Although they said they wouldn’t hold back any release purposefully because of vr. A decision I think could be overthrown very quickly.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3

item.title: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Did you even read it? A few times Ricochet 2 was mentioned, and it was as vague as ever, stuff we already knew (they’re not announcing a project years ahead of it’s time because they dislike failing to meet deadlines, no project is being withheld until VR tech is doable on a large scale or something.)

Read full topic

item.title: Valve lets out info about Half-Life 3
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
first legit HL3 beta screenshot is out?

holy shit I’m getting old

Anyway apart from the awesome valve-quality lighting and shadows, I still think it’s fake.

Now where’s my bucket, I need to go fill it up with table salt and proceed to eat it.

Read full topic
